Description: Hollow hoop, flat on the inside, the outside convex and worked in repoussé to form a central ridge. On the oval bezel is a battle scene: the warrior on the left has fallen back on his right knee and holds up his shield for protection against the warrior attacking from the right who brandishes a spear in his left hand. On the right, a quiver and two palm branches. Above and below, rouletted border.
Dimensions: W of Bezel: 1 1/16 in. (2.7 cm); Diam of Hoop: 13/16 in. (2.06 cm)
